pr_title: Change default sqlite database path from /var/run to /var/lib to ensure it is not deleted on reboot

timeline.message: Change default sqlite database path from /var/run to /var/lib to ensure it is not deleted on reboot. Fixes #6706

timeline.bodyText: Is it safe to remove the #include <shared_core/Error.hpp> rather than the forward declaration? It's not too important, since we'd just end up including Error.hpp pretty much everywhere, but I definitely have a preference for forcing each file to explicitly include all the files it needs.
timeline.author: MariaSemple

replies.bodyText: We already had a full declaration in this header file, so I just removed the forward decl (it was already declared).
replies.author: kfeinauer
